data.heading: Leakguard Leak detection & Auto Shut off
data.para: Protect Your home from water damage with this all-inclusive leak detection and prevention system that limits leaks to no more than 20 oz .of water

data.heading: Save Money & Energy
data.para: Save upto $480 per year in energy costs--thats almost $5,000 over 10 years!

data.heading: Demand Response Scheduling
data.para: You can save up to $5,000 over the life of the heater with peal and off-peak energy rate scheduling with built-in demand response-letting your utility company shift the energy usage in response to the overall demand for energy at a given time

data.heading: Carbon Footprint Reduction
data.para: The ProTerra Hybrid uses 75% less energy than a standard electric water heater to help minimize your impact on the environment-thats 4X more efficient than a standard electric water heater

data.heading: Heat Pump Technology
data.para: The ProTerra Hybrid pulls head energy from the air around it to heat your water,making it the most efficient water heater on the market with up to a 4.0 UEF

data.heading: Energy USe Tracking
data.para: View weekly,monthly and yearly energy usage reports from your phone to help you better manage energy consuption

data.heading: Operation Modes and Scheduling
data.para: Schedule set point and choose from five operation modes to adjust to your lifestyle all from the EcoNet App: Energy Saver,Heat Pump,Electric,High Demand,Vacation

data.heading: Set Vacation or Away Mode
data.para: reduce water heating costs while you're away for a week or just for the day -it's easy to set from your phone even if you've already left home

data.heading: Diagnostic Mode
data.para: Plumbers can view detailed alerts and alarm codes while at the water heater via the Rheem Contractor App to expedite service
